name: Farm King
summary: As an agricultural entrepreneur , your goal is to maximize the growth of your plants and animals. Plant the seeds of your choice, or choose which animals you want to rear on your farm. You will also need to make sure that your plants get water, sun and fertilizers to reach optimal growth!
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 益智
  • 游玩人数: 单人
  • 官方网站: http://www.king.com/games/puzzle-games/farm-king
